title: Football shirt
content:
Hi there,

Can anyone recommend this squashed sans please?

Thank you in advance.

Best  
R

| --- | --- |
| [91000482.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725070934/http:/typophile.com/files/91000482.jpg) | 137.43 KB |
author: rtgbanks

comments.content:
To me, that's a sort of Helvetica Compressed Black. Try Inserat, Haettenschweiler, Impact, Compacta...

EDIT: thanks for the correction R. I knew it was not right :)

<cite>Ryuk: Haetschenweiller</cite>

[Haettenschweiler](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725070934/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/ascender/haettenschweiler/) ;-) Named after some Swiss guy.
